title: Sano Touring – A New Tourism Business, a New Perspective on Romania
text: Receive press releases from Sano Touring: By Email RSS Feeds: Sano Touring  A New Tourism Business, a New Perspective on Romania Monday, September 28th 2015, first working day after the International Day of Tourism, was launched Sano Touring website and services, www.sanotouring.eu. Bucharest, Romania, October 03, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Sano Touring is a Romanian inbound tour-operator that emerged on the travel market with a new perspective on travelling to and through Romania, and out of passion for tourism and for Romania as a country.Sano Touring’s team clustered an amalgamation of delightful attractions and means of accommodation for them, to fully enjoy Romanian destinations. The website covers components of tours and packages: tourism without barriers, new although ancient destinations, authentic travel packages. Sano Touring tours are designed "all included," thus the tourists may sense Romania at its most.The website is divided into sections that describe the best the experiences included in the travel packages or tours: rural, accessible, wellness, seniors and special Romania. "Romania at a glance" is more than a blog, and it is especially placed in order to keep the visitors informed and to acknowledge Romania as it is. There is captured the essence of Romania, a combination of amazing nature, beautiful people set on their ancient homeland, with their beautiful traditions kept over millennial history.The core of authentic Romania is kept under the "Special Romania" section, where some of the travel tours through either Wallachia, Transylvania, Moldavia or Dobrogea are listed. Special Romania includes either long tours or, on the contrary, short city breaks. Even wellness packages’ approach has a special Sano Touring’s touch, as they all include: travel experiences, tours and holiday packages that balance body and soul while travelling through Romania."It is a project that I dreamt of for a long time: Romania to be seen and felt as it is. We want Sano Touring to be more than an inbound travel business, we want it to offer foreign tourists the opportunity to enjoy Romania with all their senses," asserted Cristina Caluianu, the owner of Sano Touring inbound tour-operator.The packages are designed in order to satisfy a large range of taste and travel interests, but above this, to cover the rights for all: Sano Touring offer is adapted, up to the extent of Romanian logistical limitations, to suit the special needs of tourists travelling to Romania. As part of Sano Touring creed and also in order to come forward to tourists with special needs, as a first step in its activity, Sano Touring was officially enclosed in the European Accessible Tourism Directory.AboutSano Touring tour-operator is a brand established by Marketing Development, a Romanian based company.The name of the agency gathered the feeling of a tourist in Romania who senses through travel that a healthy life is always in harmony with a healthy soul. As we strongly believe in "tourism for all" rights, we are here to enhance travel services in Romania that are not fully accessible at this stage on the market - accessible travel. Our offer is adapted especially for seniors and, to a certain extent given by infrastructure limitations, we designed holiday packages and tours, accessible to travellers with special needs.
